name: SpongeBob's Atlantis SquarePantis
summary: SpongeBob's Atlantis SquarePantis will follow SpongeBob and the rest of the Bikini Gang as they leave Bikini Bottom and journey to the legendary city of Atlantis. Players will discover the treasures of Atlantis, while experiencing new game mechanics and multiplayer features.
info:
